snippet.title: GHPC April 2021 update teaser: T-72 vs. Abrams
snippet.description:
A glimpse into the upcoming patch for both builds of GHPC, featuring a legendary rivalry!  The M1IP faces off against the T-72M1 in the battle for the Fulda Gap.

We will be showing and discussing this patch on stream on April 1 at 8 pm EDT!  https://www.twitch.tv/GunnerHEATPC​​

For more info, check out https://www.gunnerheatpc.com​ 
GHPC is made possible by tank and sim gaming community members like you! To support the project: https://www.patreon.com/GunnerHEATPC​ 

Trailer by TheBeastFeast
Music by AxiiiS: https://soundcloud.com/user-480009582
